segments.text: I see the woman standing by the sink, drying dishes with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so calm and focused on what she's doing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the water overflowing from the sink, pouring onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating quite a puddle, but she doesn't seem to mind.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids behind her are being so cute, trying to get cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool, reaching up high to grab a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall, but he seems determined to get that cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her turn, looking so hopeful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like this is a sweet moment, even with the water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon and sees them, maybe she'll smile.
segments.speaker: PAR
